IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vGlobalINReconciliation' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vGlobalINReconciliation] GO
CREATE VIEW vGlobalINReconciliation AS SELECT c.CompanyCD, a.SnapshotDate, a.INDate, a.Sku, a.FBACenterID, i.InventoryID, a.ERPSku AS InventoryCD, a.ProductName, a.DetailedDesc, a.Qty, a.CountryID, s.SiteID, s.SiteCD, l.LocationID, l.LocationCD, a.FNSku AS Source FROM LUMAmzINReconcilition a INNER JOIN Company c ON c.CompanyID = a.CompanyID LEFT OUTER JOIN InventoryItem i ON i.CompanyID = a.CompanyID AND i.InventoryCD = a.ERPSku AND i.DeletedDatabaseRecord = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN INSite s ON s.CompanyID = a.CompanyID AND s.SiteID = a.Warehouse LEFT OUTER JOIN INLocation l ON l.CompanyID = a.CompanyID AND l.LocationID = a.Location WHERE a.CompanyID > 0 UNION ALL SELECT c.CompanyCD, t.TranDate, t.INDate, t.Sku, t.FBACenterID, i.InventoryID, t.ERPSku AS InventoryCD, t.ProductName, t.DetailedDesc, t.Qty, t.CountryID, s.SiteID, s.SiteCD, l.LocationID, l.LocationCD, CASE WHEN t.ThirdPLType = 'T' THEN 'Topest' WHEN t.ThirdPLType = 'R' THEN 'Return Helper' WHEN t.ThirdPLType = 'F' THEN 'FedEx' WHEN t.ThirdPLType = 'G' THEN 'Google Sheets' END AS Source FROM LUM3PLINReconciliation t INNER JOIN Company c ON c.CompanyID = (SELECT TOP 1 CompanyID FROM LUMShopifyMarketplacePreference WHERE LUMShopifyMarketplacePreference.Marketplace = t.CountryID) LEFT OUTER JOIN InventoryItem i ON i.CompanyID = t.CompanyID AND i.InventoryCD = t.ERPSku AND i.DeletedDatabaseRecord = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN INSite s ON s.CompanyID = t.CompanyID AND s.SiteID = t.Warehouse LEFT OUTER JOIN INLocation l ON l.CompanyID = t.CompanyID AND l.LocationID = t.Location WHERE t.CompanyID > 0 AND t.Sku IS NOT NULL
